A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney turned one of the most beloved franchises of all time into a Conservative snuff film. It's all about female empowerment\, the stupidity of men\, the evil of capitalism\, the cruelty of the rich\, and how only poor people that come from nothing can be virtuous. You have ruined Star Wars for every generation just to push your own political agendas. Thanks.
